author: James Joyce
text: Arrived here safe. Very bad passage: sick. Will never travel again via Dieppe. Bearded Manager L N W R who gave me extension ticket 1st class Gratis!!! Travelling today, arrive tonight. Make Nora go to see Mme. Butterfly. Heard Caruso and a woman sing the love duo on a machine in Paris. Had to kick myself out of Paris or would have stayed there a week. Alvarez was singing in the Prophet and Mary Garden. Addio, Nora, addio, figlioli, addio Eva. Jim
